verses.1: Topa in kei kiangah thu hong gen a,
verses.2: “Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, leenggui pen singkung tawh bangci kiteh ding ahi hiam? Tu lak a om singkungte tawh tehna-in leenggui hiangte banga kimang ahi hiam?
verses.3: Leengguite na-in kizang thei ahi hiam? Vankhaina a zat ding singzum khet dingin kimang thei ahi hiam?
verses.4: Mei tawh nading bekin kimang hi. A mong tuak a kattum khit ciangin a om lai a zulkat teng, bangin kimang nawn ahi hiam?
verses.5: A kaat ma-in zong bangmahin kimang lo ahih manin, kaangin a vom khit ciangin a kimanna om lo semsem hi.
verses.6: “Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: Tu lak a om singte in kimanna nei hi. Ahi zongin leengguite kila-in a kihal tum mah bangin Jerusalem-a teeng mite la khia-in
verses.7: gim ka pia ding hi. Mei panin khatvei a suahtak khit hangun tu-in mei in amaute kaang tum ding hi. Amaute gim ka piak ciangin Topa ka hihna thu na hong thei ding hi.
verses.8: Keiʼ tungah amaute hong citak lo uh ahih manin gam sung khempeuh gamkhing ka suaksak ding hi, Topa Pasian in ci hi,” a hong ci hi.
